results.title: Metformin-loaded PLGA microspheres combined with an in situ-formed injectable SA/BG hydrogel alleviate rotator cuff muscle degeneration
results.text_hl: In this study, an in situ-formed injectable @CHEMICAL_Alginates @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000464 @@@sodium alginate@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Alginates @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000464 @@@SA@@@) and bioglass (BG) hydrogel consisting of @CHEMICAL_Polylactic_Acid_Polyglycolic_Acid_Copolymer @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077182 @@@poly (lactic-co-glycolic acid)@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Polylactic_Acid_Polyglycolic_Acid_Copolymer @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077182 @@@PLGA@@@) microspheres containing @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Alginates @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000464 @@@SA@@@/BG-PLGA-Met) was developed for the prevention of muscular @DISEASE_Embolism_Fat @DISEASE_MESH:D004620 @@@fat@@@ infiltration and @<m>DISEASE_Retinal_Dystrophies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058499 @@@dystrophy@@@.

citations.NLM: Wang Y, Song W, Li Y, Zhou Z, Li C, Yu W, He Y. Metformin-loaded PLGA microspheres combined with an in situ-formed injectable SA/BG hydrogel alleviate rotator cuff muscle degeneration Mater Today Bio. 2023 Dec;23():100874. PMID: 38075252
citations.BibTeX: @article{38075252, title={Metformin-loaded PLGA microspheres combined with an in situ-formed injectable SA/BG hydrogel alleviate rotator cuff muscle degeneration}, author={Wang Y and Song W and Li Y and Zhou Z and Li C and Yu W and He Y}, journal={Mater Today Bio}, volume={23}, pages={100874}}

results.title: Metformin Protects Skeletal Muscle from Cardiotoxin Induced Degeneration
results.text_hl: Since increased cytoplasmic @CHEMICAL_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002118 @@@calcium@@@ concentrations characterize additional @DISEASE_Muscle_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D019042 @@@muscle pathological@@@ conditions, including @<m>DISEASE_Retinal_Dystrophies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058499 @@@dystrophies@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment could prove a valuable strategy to ameliorate the conditions of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ affected by @<m>DISEASE_Retinal_Dystrophies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058499 @@@dystrophies@@@.

citations.NLM: Langone F, Cannata S, Fuoco C, Lettieri Barbato D, Testa S, Nardozza AP, Ciriolo MR, Castagnoli L, Gargioli C, Cesareni G. Metformin Protects Skeletal Muscle from Cardiotoxin Induced Degeneration PLoS One. 2014;9(12):e114018. PMID: 25461598
